dict.acceptation: 事先准备好的；愿意的；期望的；
事先准备好地；愿意地；期望地；
准备( prepare的过去式和过去分词)；预备（饭菜）；配备；使（自己）有准备；

sent.orig: Many people prepared different resumes for different companies. How many resumes did you prepared?
sent.trans: 很多人为申请不同的公司准备了不同的简历，你准备了几份简历？

sent.orig: Heaven—A place prepared for those who are prepared for it.
sent.trans: 天堂—是为那些准备好的人们而准备好的地方。

sent.orig: Catalysts prepared by impregnation had higher HDS activity than that prepared by mechanical mixing.
sent.trans: 浸渍焙烧所形成的催化剂其HDS活性远远高于机械混合法制备的催化剂。

sent.orig: C # prepared spy network source code! C # prepared spy network source code!
sent.trans: C#编写的网络间谍程序源代码！

sent.orig: Be prepared against war, be prepared against natural disasters, and do everything for the people.
